message.welcometext: We are a scuba diving club from Siechnice, established after the flood in 1997. We belong to the structures of the League of Defense of the Country. For over 20 years, we have been continuously teaching and supporting each other in obtaining diving and instructor certifications from the CMAS (Confédération Mondiale des Activités Subaquatiques) federation. Join our community of diving enthusiasts and discover the depths of the ocean with us.
